body_html: @benoitsteiner, are you planning to improve the numerical accuracy of reduce_sum, or should we mark it contributions welcome. The naive implementation is certainly not "incorrect" or a "bug" but it would be better for it to use multiple accumulators, magnitude ordering partial sums or whatever.
body_text: @benoitsteiner, are you planning to improve the numerical accuracy of reduce_sum, or should we mark it contributions welcome. The naive implementation is certainly not "incorrect"  or a "bug" but it would be better for it to use multiple accumulators, magnitude ordering partial sums or whatever.
body: @benoitsteiner, are you planning to improve the numerical accuracy of reduce_sum, or should we mark it contributions welcome. The naive implementation is certainly not "incorrect"  or a "bug" but it would be better for it to use multiple accumulators, magnitude ordering partial sums or whatever.
